text: Suffering Hour is the first album by the St Louis thrash/progressive metal band Anacrusis, released in 1988 on the European label Active Records. The album's recording was self-financed by the band members with $1200. The album was re-released on CD in 1990 by Metal Blade Records. == Track listing == Music and lyrics by Kenn Nardi, except where indicated # "Present Tense" (Nardi, Kevin Heidbreder, Tom Liskey) – 6:22 # "Imprisoned" – 6:11 # "R.O.T."
